title: Check return code and report error output from all subprocess calls

content.raw:
Anywhere that we call a subprocess via commands.*, we should be checking the return code and in the case that non-zero is returned, printing to console both stdout and stderr from the subprocess.  Otherwise, it's difficult to understand what's going wrong.

As a side note, we should transition from the deprecated commands module to the newer subprocess module.
